rules_text: Xanigan deals 2 damage to any target. You gain 2 life.
special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud, you get an emblem with exalted. [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[+2]: Xanigan deals 2 damage to up to one target and you gain 2 life.
[-3]: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
